name: Slow-Cooked Beef Loin Tri-Tip Roast
author: MYBADA
summary: A 2.24-pound beauty of a roast. I had read other recipes for cooking a roast in slow cooker, none of which sounded like my goal recipe. So here it is a new take on a slow cooking roast recipe.The roast is a 2.24-pound beef loin tri-tip seasoned roast. This one had very little fat.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed, divided
2 ¼ pounds seasoned beef loin tri-tip roast
1 pinch adobo seasoning (such as Goya®), or more to taste
directions: Coat the inside of a slow cooker with about 1 tablespoon olive oil
Coat the inside of a skillet with about 1 tablespoon olive oil and heat over medium-high heat
Cook roast in the hot oil until browned, about 5 minutes per side
Cook and stir onion in the hot oil during the last 5 minutes of browning the roast
Transfer roast to the slow cooker, reserving onion in the skillet
Pour water over onion; crumble bouillon cube into water
Add garlic and adobo seasoning to onion mixture; cook and stir until onion is tender, about 5 minutes
Cook on High until meat is cooked through and tender, about 4 hours
